ðŸ” Trade Setup Steps:

ðŸš€ $15 to $1500 Battle Plan (12-Month Compounding Strategy)
Month 1â€“2 (Foundation Phase)

Month 3â€“5 (Momentum Phase)

Month 6â€“9 (Aggression Phase)
Risk up to 2% per trade ONLY IF  win rate > 50% & avg RR > 2R
Focus on size management, scale in winners
Withdraw nothing. Let equity build
Account Goal: $100 â†’ $500
Month 10â€“12 (Consistency Phase)

Maintain trade quality â€” 1 sniper/week1.
